entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who helped Harry by smashing through the boundary and entering the castle.

entities.name: grawpy
entities.description: Grawpy is mentioned as the animal that carried Hagrid and Fang through the forest to reach the castle.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is introduced as one of the animals that helped Hagrid and Grawpy in reaching the castle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's absence from the scene is mentioned by Harry as a question to be answered.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's absence from the scene is also mentioned by Harry as a question to be answered.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who (Voldemort) is introduced as the one who gave Hagrid an ultimatum to hand over Harry before midnight.

relationships.description: Hagrid was carried by Grawpy through the forest.
Hagrid and Fang were carried together by Grawpy.
You-Know-Who gave an ultimatum to Hagrid to hand over Harry before midnight.
